name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
summary: Apple's 2023 flagship pairs the A17 Pro chipset with a titanium frame, a versatile triple camera system, and all-day battery life.
highlights: Titanium chassis with Action Button
5× tetraprism telephoto lens with sensor-shift OIS
ProRes, Log video, and spatial video capture

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
summary: Samsung refines the Ultra formula with flatter sides, Gorilla Armor glass, and the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 for Galaxy across all regions.
highlights: Integrated S Pen with latency under 2.8ms
Gorilla Armor glass with anti-glare coating
Galaxy AI features (Circle to Search, Live Translate, Note Assist)

name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
summary: Pixel 8 Pro leans into AI-assisted photography with the Tensor G3 chipset, pro camera controls, and seven years of software support.
highlights: Night Sight video and Video Boost editing pipeline
Body temperature sensor (select markets)
7 years of Android OS + security + feature drops

name: OnePlus 12
summary: OnePlus combines Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 power, Hasselblad-calibrated cameras, and 100W SuperVOOC charging in a refined flagship.

shortSpecs.display: 6.82" QHD+ LTPO OLED, 120Hz, up to 4500 nits
shortSpecs.cameras: 50MP Sony LYT-808 main + 64MP 3× periscope + 48MP ultrawide; 32MP front

highlights: Three-level Alert Slider with customizable actions
RainWater Smart Touch for wet display usability
Dolby Vision HDR video capture and playback

name: Xiaomi 14 Ultra
summary: Xiaomi’s Leica partnership peaks with the 14 Ultra’s variable f/1.63-f/4.0 main lens, a 1" sensor, and pro-grade video controls.

shortSpecs.cameras: 50MP 1" LYT-900 variable aperture main + 50MP 3.2× tele + 50MP 5× periscope + 50MP ultrawide; 32MP front

highlights: Leica Authentic & Vibrant color science profiles
Professional Photography Kit accessory with physical controls
IP68 ingress protection with nanotech vegan leather finish

name: Oppo Find X7 Ultra
summary: Find X7 Ultra debuts Oppo’s dual periscope system, delivering 3× and 6× optical zoom alongside a Hasselblad color pipeline.
highlights: Hasselblad Portrait Mode with Master Mode tuning
Stereo speakers with spatial audio support
ColorOS 14 with Trinity Engine performance optimizations

name: Vivo X100 Pro
summary: Vivo’s Zeiss co-engineering brings a 1" main sensor, V3 imaging chip, and a floating periscope lens to the Dimensity 9300-powered X100 Pro.
highlights: Zeiss T* coating and Vario-Apo-Sonnar portrait tuning
Vivo V3 imaging chip for 4K cinematic portrait video
IP68 rating with curved “Sun Halo” camera design

name: Realme GT 5 Pro
summary: Realme’s GT 5 Pro delivers flagship Snapdragon performance, rapid 100W charging, and a periscope telephoto at an aggressive price.
highlights: Iceberg Vapor Cooling System Max with 12000mm² VC
AI Night Vision video amplification
Stainless steel frame with vegan leather options

name: Nothing Phone (2)
summary: Nothing builds on its transparent design with a Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1, Glyph lighting automations, and clean Nothing OS 2.0 software.
highlights: Glyph Interface automations for notifications and timers
Nothing OS 2.0 with customizable monochrome widgets
3 years Android updates + 4 years security patches

name: Motorola Razr 40 Ultra
summary: Motorola’s flagship flip phone features the largest cover display in its class, paired with water-repellent design and Flex View software tricks.
highlights: Flex View modes for hands-free selfies and video calls
IP52 water-repellent nanocoating
MyUX with native Ready For desktop streaming

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold5
summary: Samsung’s fifth-gen Fold refines the hinge for a gapless design, lighter chassis, and multitasking upgrades tuned for large screen productivity.

shortSpecs.display: 7.6" QXGA+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X 120Hz inner + 6.2" HD+ 120Hz cover
shortSpecs.cameras: 50MP main + 10MP 3× telephoto + 12MP ultrawide; 10MP cover selfie + 4MP under-display

highlights: Flex hinge rated for 200k folds with IPX8 water resistance
Taskbar with app pairs and drag-and-drop copy between apps
S Pen Fold Edition support with dedicated cases

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 13 Pro+
summary: A mid-range standout with a 200MP main camera, 120W HyperCharge, and curved AMOLED display—all while keeping Redmi pricing aggressive.

shortSpecs.cameras: 200MP Samsung HP3 OIS main + 8MP ultrawide + 2MP macro; 16MP front

highlights: IP68 dust and water resistance—first for Redmi Note
In-display fingerprint sensor with heart-rate mode
MIUI 14 with promised HyperOS upgrade

name: Google Pixel 8a
summary: Pixel 8a brings the Tensor G3, AI-smarts, and seven years of updates to an affordable package with a brighter 120Hz OLED display.
highlights: Audio Magic Eraser and Best Take photography tools
Seven years of OS, Feature Drops, and security updates
IP67 rating with matte composite back and aluminum frame

name: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G
summary: Samsung’s mid-ranger adds an aluminum frame, IP67, and five years of security updates while keeping Knox-secured software.
highlights: IP67 dust and water resistance with Gorilla Glass Victus+
Knox Vault hardware-backed security and Samsung Wallet
Four Android OS upgrades + five years security patches
